scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:cov
scripts.verify:local: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:cov
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && aws s3 sync dist s3://staging-staging-web-webbucket12880f5b-qqnt6ea0jfcd --delete --exclude "*.js" --exclude "*.css" --exclude "*.map" --exclude "*.svg" --exclude "*.html" && aws s3 cp dist s3://staging-staging-web-webbucket12880f5b-qqnt6ea0jfcd --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.js" --content-type application/javascript --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" && aws s3 cp dist s3://staging-staging-web-webbucket12880f5b-qqnt6ea0jfcd --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.css" --content-type text/css --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" && aws s3 cp dist s3://staging-staging-web-webbucket12880f5b-qqnt6ea0jfcd --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.map" --content-type application/json --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" && aws s3 cp dist s3://staging-staging-web-webbucket12880f5b-qqnt6ea0jfcd --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.svg" --content-type image/svg+xml --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" && aws s3 cp dist s3://staging-staging-web-webbucket12880f5b-qqnt6ea0jfcd --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --content-type text/html --cache-control "no-cache" && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1WNT7EZ9TRQSG --paths "/*"
scripts.deploy:prod: node -e "console.error('Set prod S3 bucket + CloudFront distribution IDs before deploying.'); process.exit(1)"
